refnamediv.refpurpose: Selects the slot to be use by further lp opcodes.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Selects the slot to be use by further lp opcodes.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: islot -- number of slot to be selected.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: lpslot selects the slot to be use by further lp opcodes. This is the way to load and reference several analyses at the same time.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
